knimeNode.name: Expand Hierarchy
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node for expanding boundaries of generalization hierarchies.

fullDescription.intro:
Node for expanding boundaries of generalization hierarchies.
For interval-based hierarchies: minimum and maximum values will be adjusted according to data from the input table.
For order-based hierarchies: order list will be extended by adding any missing values to the end of the list.
Date- and mask-based hierarchies doesn't require expanding and will be returned unchanged.

tab.name: Hierarchies
tab.description: Area for specifying hierarchies for expanding. Multiple hierarchies could be expanded within a single node.
tab.option: Input table column corresponding to the selected hierarchy.
Arx hierarchy file (*.ahs). Can be empty in case when hierarchy is provided through Arx Config Overrides port.
